description: From zero to production, we developed a full application including a Chrome extension. Some of my responsabilities are leading and mentoring a team of developers, fostering a collaborative environment. Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of the project, ensuring they align with organizational goals and meet high-quality standards. Act as a bridge between technical and non-technical stakeholders, communicating complex concepts in a clear and understandable manner.

Deliver high-quality, robust production code for a diverse array of projects inside ICE Mortgage Technology. Worked on both, web and mobile applications collaborating with a huge number of teams from around the globe.
